com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.plugins.places.autocomplete.model

Class PlaceOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.plugins.places.autocomplete.model.PlaceOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Parcelable

    public abstract class PlaceOptions
extends Object
implements Parcelable
    Create a PlaceOptions object which can be used to customize the autocomplete geocoder results and the UI component. There are two modes to further change the autocomplete UI to fit your app better.
    • Full screen mode: will place all the search history, results, and injected places into a view which has a width equal to the app width.
    • Card view mode: the place search history, results, and injected places in into a androidx.cardview.widget.CardView
    Since:
    0.1.0

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlaceOptions

        public PlaceOptions()

    • Method Detail

      • proximity

        public abstract Point proximity()
        Bias local results based on a provided Point. This oftentimes increases accuracy in the returned results.
        Returns:
        proximity a point defining the proximity you'd like to bias the results around
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • language

        public abstract String language()
        Specify the language to use for response text and, for forward geocoding, query result weighting. Options are IETF language tags comprised of a mandatory ISO 639-1 language code and optionally one or more IETF subtags for country or script. More than one value can also be specified, separated by commas.
        Returns:
        a string representing the language as a locale
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • limit

        public abstract int limit()
        Limit the number of results returned. The default is 10.
        Returns:
        the number of results returned by the geocoder
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • historyCount

        public abstract Integer historyCount()
        Limit the number of results returned. The default is the maximum number of historical searches already saved by the Places plugin.
        Returns:
        the number of past search results returned by the geocoder
        Since:
        0.9.0

      • bbox

        public abstract String bbox()
        Limit results to a bounding box. Options are in the format minX,minY,maxX,maxY.
        Returns:
        the string with the coordinate order minX,minY,maxX,maxY
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • geocodingTypes

        public abstract String geocodingTypes()
        This optionally can be set to filter the results returned inside the suggestions.

        Note that com.mapbox.api.geocoding.v5.GeocodingCriteria#TYPE_POI_LANDMARK returns a subset of the results returned by com.mapbox.api.geocoding.v5.GeocodingCriteria#TYPE_POI. More than one type can be specified.

        Returns:
        the applied filter(s) or null if none were set
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • country

        public abstract String country()
        Limit results to one or more countries. Options are ISO 3166 alpha 2 country codes separated by commas.
        Returns:
        a string with the country codes you are limiting the geocoder responses to
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • injectedPlaces

        public abstract List<String> injectedPlaces()
        Optionally inject CarmenFeatures into the suggestion view so users can access points of interest quickly without typing a single character. Typical places include, the users home, work, or favorite POI.
        Returns:
        a list of serialized CarmenFeatures which show immediately when the autocomplete UI is displayed to the user
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • viewMode

        public abstract int viewMode()
        When the PlaceOptions.Builder.build(int) method is called you can optionally pass in one of MODE_CARDS or MODE_FULLSCREEN which determines which layout you'd like to use for your autocomplete view.
        Returns:
        an integer representing either the MODE_CARDS or MODE_FULLSCREEN mode
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • backgroundColor

        public abstract int backgroundColor()
        Set the autocomplete's layout background color. Defaults Color.TRANSPARENT.
        Returns:
        the background color as a ColorInt
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • toolbarColor

        public abstract int toolbarColor()
        Set the autocomplete's layout toolbar color. Defaults Color.WHITE.
        Returns:
        the toolbar color as a ColorInt
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • statusbarColor

        public abstract int statusbarColor()
        Set the autocomplete's layout status bar color. Defaults Color.BLACK.
        Returns:
        the status bar color as a ColorInt
        Since:
        0.9.0

      • hint

        public abstract String hint()
        Optionally set the hint string which is shown before the user inputs a search term inside the top edit text.
        Returns:
        the string used inside the edit text to display to the user before they input a character
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • baseUrl

        public abstract String baseUrl()
        Optionally change the base URL of the geocoding request to something other then the default Mapbox one.
        Returns:
        base url of geocoding request
        Since:
        0.12.0

      • builder

        public static PlaceOptions.Builder builder()
        Build a new instance of the PlaceOptions class using this method. It will return the PlaceOptions.Builder which can be used to customize the users experience.
        Returns:
        an instance of PlaceOptions.Builder used to create a new PlaceOptions instance
        Since:
        0.1.0
